doc:
Ollie Kirkby https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ollie_Kirkby 0 Ollie Kirkby (September 26, 1886 – October 7, 1964) was a stage, screen, and vaudeville actress. Her entire career dedicated to making short films or serials from 1914 until 1923. She was married to actor George Larkin from 1918 to his death in 1946. She was born in Philadelphia and died at Glendale California. She was known for the dimple on her shoulder and often photographed to show that distinguishing feature.In addition to her acting career, she also wrote scripts with her husband, which include Bulldog Courage (1922) and The Pell Street Mystery (1924). Ollie_Kirkby ( September_26_,_1886 – October_7_,_1964 ) was a_stage , screen , and vaudeville_actress . Her_entire_career dedicated to making short_films_or_serials from 1914 until 1923 .
